hero.title: Isabela Sánchez Ramírez
hero.subtitle: Data and Software Engineer
hero.description: Creating code with purpose and analyzing data with passion. Engineer committed to building technology that solves real problems.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a proactive, disciplined, and self-taught person, with a constant passion for learning and growing professionally. As a Data and Software Engineer, I possess diverse competencies and skills that allow me to face technological and analytical challenges with creativity and efficiency. My focus is on creating innovative solutions that generate real value.

being.title: Being Competencies
items: Data analysis for continuous learning and improvement

knowing.title: Knowing Competencies
items: Fundamentals of Data Science and Software Engineering

doing.title: Doing Competencies
items: Design and implementation of data storage and processing systems
Basic development of web platforms with Flask and Django
Problem analysis through algorithms and data structures

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Relevant projects I have developed, demonstrating my experience and skills acquired so far in the field of data engineering and software development.

footer.description: Data and Software Engineer passionate about creating innovative solutions that generate real value.

webDeveloper.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: Integration of the geoportal project for the municipality of Envigado
Write code in languages such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Integrate APIs and generate dynamic charts, as well as connect external services
Ensure the page displays correctly on different devices
Collaborate with designers, analysts and other developers to deliver an efficient, secure and easy-to-use digital product

intern.title: Data and Software Engineering Intern
responsibilities: Define use cases and operation scenarios for the Matrix system
Design an intuitive and accessible user interface, where users can search, filter and visualize configuration parameters and values easily
Define and apply user experience (UX) guidelines that optimize the ease of use of the Matrix system module of Auna
Program and configure the Backend of the module, integrating it with the database and the necessary applications to manage configuration parameters and values

rvistete.title: R-vistete
rvistete.description: Website for renting and buying garments based on circular fashion with sentiment analysis.
